name: Jack Smokesteel: Steampunk Anime Paranormal Investigator
name_original: Jack Smokesteel: Steampunk Anime Paranormal Investigator
description: A twine of the latest adventure of Jack Smokesteel, Steampunk Anime Paranormal Investigator. When the Prime Ministers waifu goes missing, the robot curator of the Steampunk London Museum of Anime knows who to go to to find her, Jack Smokesteel, Steampunk Anime Paranormal Investigator!
